plot: Awkward 11-year-old Nasma's father has been killed. His pigeons are all she has left of him. At odds with her mother and the boy next door Nasma will unexpectedly come face-to-face with womanhood.
title: Nasma's Pigeons
plot_es: Awkward 11-year-old Nasma's father has been killed. His pigeons are all she has left of him. At odds with her mother and the boy next door Nasma will unexpectedly come face-to-face with womanhood.
plot_en: Awkward 11-year-old Nasma's father has been killed. His pigeons are all she has left of him. At odds with her mother and the boy next door Nasma will unexpectedly come face-to-face with womanhood.
